name: SwimChamp
description:
The ultimate Swimming Simulator!

Take your rookie swimmer from the local 25m breaststroke meet all the way up to the world championships in 200IM against the very best on the planet!
In-depth simulation with swimmer customization, training and upgrades including realistic athletic characteristics like strength, fitness, stamina and lung capacity, but also all the classic skills you can sharpen through practice: dive, turn, streamline and all strokes techniques.
Races include most distances from the 25m all the way up to 200m, in all 4 strokes: FreeStyle, BreastStroke, BackStroke and Butterfly, plus the Medley (IM).
Improve your swimmer and technique, and climb your way up the leaderboards and challenge friends in competitions against the very best!
